enchantment.miningmaster.freezing.desc: Inflicts Slowness on hit. Also deals extra damage to fire-based entities.
enchantment.miningmaster.leeching.desc: Heals the user for a portion of damage dealt on critical strikes.
enchantment.miningmaster.smelting.desc: Causes blocks to drop the smelted version of their usual drops when broken.
enchantment.miningmaster.stonebreaker.de: Causes certain stones and Netherrack to not be dropped when broken.
enchantment.miningmaster.runner.desc: Gives the user a boost to their base speed when worn. Boots take durability damage when sprinting.
enchantment.miningmaster.heartfelt.desc: Gives the user an increase to their max health when worn.
enchantment.miningmaster.floatation.desc: Applies levitation to enemies on hit.
enchantment.miningmaster.knight_jump.des: Gives the user extra mid-air jumps when worn.
enchantment.miningmaster.snowpiercer.des: Grants the user the Speed effect when on snow/ice when worn.
enchantment.miningmaster.grace.desc: Gives the user a burst of Dolphin's Grace when entering water, at the cost of durability decay while the effect is active. Requires the user to return to land to recharge.
